Title: Relates to the discovery of material, non-material and impeachment information and the required time frame for such discovery
Summary: Relates to the discovery of material, non-material and impeachment information and the required time frame for such discovery; requires the submission of a certificate of compliance upon completion of certain discovery requirements.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to the discovery of material, non-material and impeachment information and the required time frame for such discovery
